summary: Adds a golden gild to the ebony armor and weapons, like in Oblivion which I personally think looked a lot better.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve put together all of the other variations at this link if you are interested in them
+Link is: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7110


Description: Adds a gold gild to the entire ebony set (male/female weapons and armor).

Update: Added silver cloth as an optional file, changes the specular maps of the body armor for both ebony armor and ebony mail, so it should work with any texture replacer for the ebony set (in case you want to use it on VES).

Finished the entire set! The ebony mail is in this version (1.8), hope everyone enjoys!
Other mods:
Enhanced glass armor: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1985
Enhanced glass weapons: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2168



If you would like a certain color feel free to ask, even if its as simple as red or green this shouldn\'t take too much time for each one (at least compared to this mod\'s creation).

         Installation:
Step 1: Go to you data folder (located in your root skyrim folder, most likely within steam)
Step 2: Drag and drop the Texture folder in the data folder, merge any files if it asks
Step 3: Enjoy!
[IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/1842-1-1322526135.jpg[/IMG]

Legal:
-Don\'t upload any of my files anywhere without my permission.
-Don\'t change any of my files and claim them as your own without my permission.
-Respect that I have devoted a lot of time to this mod, do not steal my work.
author: Linkcube
